project.name: munit
project.description: MassiveUnit is a cross-platform haXe unit testing framework from Massive Interactive that utilises haxe metadata markup for test cases and includes tools for generating, compiling and running test cases from the command line.
project.version: Added rich html print client, added support for MCover, added command line apis for creating stub test classes, minor additions to .munit project config file. Fixed bug with as2/as3 targets being compiled when not targets
